mapper.select: SELECT STR_ID , STR_NM , STR_ADDR , STR_CALL_NUM , MBR_ID , TO_CHAR(STR_OPN_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') STR_OPN_TM , TO_CHAR(STR_CLS_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') STR_CLS_TM , USE_YN , DEL_YN FROM STR

SELECT S.STR_ID , S.STR_NM , S.STR_ADDR , S.STR_CALL_NUM , S.MBR_ID , TO_CHAR(S.STR_OPN_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') STR_OPN_TM , TO_CHAR(S.STR_CLS_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') STR_CLS_TM , S.USE_YN , S.DEL_YN FROM STR S INNER JOIN STR_PRDT STP ON S.STR_ID = STP.STR_ID INNER JOIN MBR M ON S.STR_ID = M.STR_ID INNER JOIN PRDT PT ON STP.PRDT_ID = PT.PRDT_ID WHERE STR_ID= #{_parameter} ORDER BY S.STR_ID ASC
SELECT STR_ID , STR_NM , STR_ADDR , STR_CALL_NUM , TO_CHAR(STR_OPN_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') STR_OPN_TM , TO_CHAR(STR_CLS_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') STR_CLS_TM , USE_YN FROM STR WHERE STR_ID= #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STR (STR_ID , STR_NM , STR_ADDR , STR_CALL_NUM , MBR_ID , TO_CHAR(STR_OPN_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') STR_OPN_TM , TO_CHAR(STR_CLS_TM, 'HH24:MI:SS') STR_CLS_TM , USE_YN , DEL_YN) VALUES ('ST-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || LAPD(SEQ_STR_PK.NEXTVAL, 5, '0') , #{strNm} , #{strAddr} , #{strCallNum} , #{mbrId} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , NVL(#{useYn}, 'Y') , 'N' )
